props.subtitle: Case Study
props.description: PetZo showcases a thoughtfully designed pet website that enhances user experience, highlighting services, products, and pet care tips while ensuring smooth navigation and fast performance.

tabs.label: Overview
tabs.content: PetZo was built to offer pet owners a seamless and enjoyable online experience, providing information about services, products, and events for pets.

tabs.label: Objective
tabs.content: Our goal was to create a website that conveys care, trust, and fun for pet owners while making interactions and browsing effortless across all devices.

goals: Create an inviting, pet-focused website that builds trust and excitement
Showcase services, products, and events for pets clearly and attractively
Enable easy online bookings for pet services and appointments
Provide smooth browsing across all devices, from desktop to mobile
Optimize site speed and overall performance for happy visitors
Follow SEO best practices to help pet owners discover PetZo online
Integrate social media to share pet stories and updates
Design a UI/UX that engages users and encourages return visits
Ensure compatibility across browsers and devices
Allow flexibility for future updates, promotions, and new services
